review: Does what I expected it to do

review: i would literally die without chromecast 10/10 would recommend

review: I was good at the beginning. After 7 months, there is nothing show up on TV anymore except the sound. I was supposed it could last longer...
author: Caroline

review: LOVE the Chromecast. I can cast from my phone, makes my phone act like a laptop, movie projector. LOVE IT! OH, and there are FUN games on it too!
author: Ana

review: I like this decice however it doesn't play well with iOS for music. Otherwise apps work well and load pretty fast. I with there was an interface with a remote for the unit however this is not a roku or meant to be one
author: NB

review: works great, streams in HD from phone tablet, pc, etc. will recommend everyone to get one and avoid HDMI cables
author: fabrice
